EmailTemplate.description: Email template when Case is Received
EmailTemplate.name: Support Auto Response
EmailTemplate.subject: We have received your message {!Case.Thread_Id} - Case number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to the Luxury Presence Support team. This automated email is to confirm that we have received your email and our dedicated team will be diligently working on addressing your request/concerns as quickly as possible.
In case you require immediate attention, we strongly recommend reaching out to our Support team via phone or chat. This will ensure the quickest resolution for your concerns.
*Live Chat: To start a chat, click on the Chat button in the bottom right corner of the Presence™ Platform *Phone Support: 310-955-1077
Our standard operating hours are from 6 am to 6 pm Pacific Time, Monday through Friday. During nights, weekends, and holidays, we have limited coverage for emergency situations.
While you await our response, we encourage you to explore our comprehensive Help Center, where you can access a wealth of resources, including tutorials, recorded webinars, step-by-step guides, and more.
Our goal is to empower you with the knowledge and tools you need to succeed.
Thank you for being a valued member of the Luxury Presence community, we’re looking forward to assisting you.
Best regards, The Luxury Presence Support Team
